text:
For true crime, with a very serious host- try Casefile. [Casefile on Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/show/4V3K3zyD0k789eaSWFXzhc?si=Rm0_hGmMTGGU2480mpaFwg) 

Heads up, the first dozen or so eps the host is definitely finding his feet- but it is one of the only true crime podcasts that I continue to listen to because I was also getting jack of the humorous and joke-style banter a lot of the other podcasters use.
